page.title: 20ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS, W.KILBRIDE
page.content: All the{information}on this disk and the disk about Seamill, was carefully {gathered}together by{all the members of the{three primary seven classes in {West Kilbride Primary School, viz., {P7a, P7b, and P7c. }They did all the hard work of conducting interviews, writing reports and in some cases taking recordings of interviews for transcript later. Once all the information had been gathered, theirs was the task of{sorting it all out into the appropriate categories and then using the best of all the information to compile the individual pages on the disk. All this work was done in a very{enthusiastic}and {hard-working}fashion. Without all this hard work, a lot of interesting facts about West Kilbride might never have been found out or saved.
